message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. I know it's worth more to me, but I'm willing to negotiate a fair price. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose an offer of $9,500 for your product.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. I'm willing to come down to $9,750.  Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose an offer of $9,600 for your product.
